author: The Canadian Press
title: How does Western Canadian Select oil pricing work?
description: Western Canada's oil price woes are often illustrated by references to the Western Canadian Select benchmark crude oil price.
content:
Western Canada's oil price woes are often illustrated by references to the Western Canadian Select benchmark crude oil price.
Alberta Premier Jason Kenney over the weekend released a tweet warning WCS is "now trading at negative prices," with an illustration… [+2860 chars]
